name: Ganymede II
description:
You are an employee at Power UK Industries and were sent to the orbit of the planet Ganymede II for a mission. In the past the employees had to get themselfs down on the planet to collect the valuable Xylenium crystals. Luckily the company advanced itself and uses robots for the direct operation. These robots are controlled via the spaceship.

If your robot is destroyed you will send a new one down to the planet but it will impact your score.

You will get a report of all the events that happen.

You need at least 30 Xylenium crystals to complete your mission.

Good luck!

Found some bugs or want to give me feedback? Just write me an eMail: contact@ganymede2.info
